front.title: Remote Network Monitoring Management Information Base Version 2

abstract.t: This document defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP-based internets. In particular, it defines objects for managing remote network monitoring devices.
This document obsoletes RFC 2021, updates RFC 3273, and contains a new version of the RMON2-MIB module. [STANDARDS-TRACK]
